attributes.action: Demand the Uk’s Main Stream media give a full and fair view on current affairs
attributes.additional_details:
Events not being covered fairly include;
Brexit
Tommy Robinson arrest
Protest marches weekly in our cities
Grooming gangs and sentences not being reported or covered
Policing of hate crime 
Freedom of speech restrictions
attributes.background: Currently in the UK we have a lot of unrest which is not being fairly covered by the main stream media, key events - protests and infringements on Liberty are going unreported. As a result voters are being fed propaganda leading to an uninformed vote, a full and fair media is a key part of democracy

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Media coverage is a matter for individual media companies.
